message:
After our beloved government contracted surveillance companies to spy on us online, it is important for us to find ways to combat this surveillance. It is not an Egyptian issue, we all know about the NSA (National Security Agency) scandal in USA and documents leaked by Edward Snowden, this made a worldwide movement to combat surveillance agencies.

Letâ€™s share our knowledge in combating the surveillance. We all know about Tor but there is lots of great open source software which provide alternatives for untrusted widely used proprietary software.  Check this site out: http://prism-break.org/en/ and you will find alternatives you never heard about before. Keep in mind any way, if you want to have privacy, you will have to sacrifice usability and performance.
story: Mostafa Mohamed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Opt out of global data surveillance programs like PRISM, XKeyscore, and Tempora - PRISM Break -...
caption: prism-break.org
description: Opt out of global data surveillance programs like PRISM, XKeyscore and Tempora. Help make mass surveillance of entire populations uneconomical! We all have a right to privacy, which you can exercise today by encrypting your communications and ending your reliance on proprietary services.
